commands.speaker: Hanamaru
commands.line: *Sigh* That balance beam competition was so harrowing, zura.

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: That wasn't a beam, it was more like a rope... No, a string.

commands.speaker: Mari
commands.line: Okay, everyone, gather 'round! Our next battle will be... A rodeo showdown!

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: A rodeo?! So that means whoever can stay on the mechanical bull the longest wins? The fortitude and balance to hold out through its violent bucks are the keys to victory here!

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: It may be mechanical, but when it comes to handling an animal, our equestrian, Mari, might have the advantage here?

commands.speaker: Mari
commands.line: No way. A live horse and a mechanical bull are two totally different beasts. All right, let the battle begin!

commands.speaker: Hanamaru
commands.line: Th-This is my first time riding a bull.

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: Pull the lever near your hand and it'll start moving. Pull it slowly.

commands.speaker: Hanamaru
commands.line: Pull the lever... Whoa! It's moving! Ahaha, this is fun, zura!

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: I wasn't expecting it to be so slow... It looks like she could ride that for hours.

commands.speaker: Hanamaru
commands.line: Zuraaaaaaa?!

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: Whoa! It started going really fast!

commands.speaker: Hanamaru
commands.line: Eeeeekkk! I-I-I'm scared, zura! I'm gonna fall, zura! Whoa, Mr. Bull! Whoa, I said!

commands.speaker: Hanamaru
commands.line: Nooo, zura! It's not listening to me, zura! It really is dangerous to hop onto an animal's back without thinking, zura!

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: *Pant* *Pant* *Pant* This bull is much livelier than I was expecting!

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: But you were able to stay on for so long, Setsuna.

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: Hanamaru, are you okay?

commands.speaker: Hanamaru
commands.line: Ahhh... I'm still dizzy, zura.

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: Right now, Eli's in first place at 1 minute, 30 seconds. The last one to ride is...Mari.

commands.speaker: Mari
commands.line: Okay! Go easy on me, you wild bull... There!

commands.speaker: Mari
commands.line: *Giggle* You're so rambunctious! Are you that happy I'm riding on you?

commands.speaker: Mari
commands.line: You can kick up even more of a fuss if you want. To be totally honest, this isn't enough for me. You won't set my heart on fire unless you rev it up!

commands.speaker: Mari
commands.line: C'mon! Gimme more! Rock my heart to the core!

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: You're amazing, Mari! It's shaking so much, but your posture is still rock solid!

commands.speaker: Mari
commands.line: It's only trembling like a kitten! Look, I can take my hands off and be totally fine! Oh, you're taking a photo? Yay, let me flash a peace sign!

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: Mari, you can't take your hands offâ€“

commands.speaker: Mari
commands.line: NOOO!

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: Mari made it 34 seconds. Which means Eli won at the mechanical bull.

commands.speaker: Mari
commands.line: Unbelievable! One more! Lemme give it one more go!

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: Mari, please... If you get infinite tries, it won't be a fair competition.

commands.speaker: Mari
commands.line: Come on! My physique is honed from years of horse-riding, but I only lasted a measly 34 seconds! It's too pathetic to bear, my time is too short!

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: So you DID think you'd have an advantage.

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: Even if you have overwhelming advantages in experience, knowledge, and circumstance, victory isn't guaranteed. That's what competing's all about. Accept it and move on, Mari!

commands.speaker: Mari
commands.line: Waaahhh! I'm so mad I lost!
